text: Mudar Mohammad Ayesh Badran () (18 January 1934 - 22 April 2023) was a Jordanian politician and government minister, and starting 1993, a Jordanian industrialist mainly in steel manufacturing. He served as Prime Minister of Jordan from 1976 to 1979, again from 1980 to 1984, and again from 1989 to 1991. Badran was born in Jerash, Jordan in 1934. He died on 22 April 2023, at the age of 89. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Prime Ministers of Jordan
title: Mudar Badran
